Function.Description: The downcase function converts upper case characters to lower case characters.

Brief.Overview-String: The downcase function converts upper case Character or Strings into lower case characters.
Brief.Overview-Symbol: The downcase function converts upper case Character in the input Symbol into lower case characters.
Brief.Usage: Use the downcasefunction is used to convert upper case Character to lower case characters.

Argument.Name: char
Argument.Note: A character argument or String argument

Syntax-String.Return: A new Character or String with all the upper case characters in the original argument converted to lower case.

Syntax-Symbol.Return: A new Symbol with all the upper case characters in the original argument converted to lower case.
